meta.name: The Midnight Atelier
meta.subtitle: Snatched silhouettes. Midnight silk. A wardrobe for the wardrobe.
meta.tagline: Step through the fur coats into something darker.
meta.hero_quote: I have been searching for the stars, and I have found them in your eyes.
meta.footer_message: For nights that turn into mornings.

products.name: Silk Midi Dress
products.description: The dress that makes you feel like the main character. 100% silk charmeuse that fits at the bodice and flows to a midi hem. Sustainable luxury from LA—because some nights are meant to be mysterious.

products.name: Silk Slip Dress
products.description: A slip dress that whispers rather than shouts. Silk charmeuse with a cowl neck, bias cut, and a length that grazes the ankle. California ease meets evening elegance.

products.name: Shon Pant
products.description: The pant that makes you walk different. Wide leg, high rise, pleat front. Editor-approved for Fashion Week. The pant that says you've arrived.

products.name: Pleated Trousers
products.description: Scandinavian minimalism meets downtown cool. Pleated front, tapered ankle, and a silhouette that flatters. The trouser you build outfits around.

products.name: Hangisi 70
products.description: The shoe. Navy blue satin with the Swarovski crystal buckle. It's not just a shoe, it's jewelry for your feet. 70mm heel for dancing until the magic fades.

products.name: The Demi
products.description: Made-to-order flats that feel like clouds. Black suede, perfect for late night adventures. Spanish craftsmanship meets New York minimalism.

products.name: T-Lock Clutch
products.description: Minimalism with an edge. The T-Lock clutch in black grain leather. Sculptural shape, silver hardware. It holds your phone, your lipstick, and your secrets.

products.name: Threadbare Band
products.description: A whisper of gold. Thin enough to stack, solid enough to last. Brooklyn-made, ethically sourced. The ring that goes with everything because it goes with you.
